Dauda Tijani


He was born on the 3rd of March, 2003 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Alhaji Saeed and Hajia Hawa.

Career

He started his footballing career with Mighty Warriors.

He had his basic education at Twifo Praso Senior High School (TWIPASS).

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a goalkeeper.

He enjoys playing football at his leisure time.
